CreateArtifactUploadUrl.name: CreateArtifactUploadUrl
CreateArtifactUploadUrl.documentation: Creates a pre-signed, S3 write URL for uploading a repository zip archive.

CreateUploadUrl.name: CreateUploadUrl
CreateUploadUrl.documentation: Creates a pre-signed, S3 write URL for uploading a repository zip archive.

GenerateCompletions.name: GenerateCompletions
GenerateCompletions.documentation: Generate completions based on the provided file context in a paginated response.

GetCodeAnalysis.name: GetCodeAnalysis
GetCodeAnalysis.documentation: Gets the metadata of a code analysis job.

GetTaskAssistCodeGeneration.name: GetTaskAssistCodeGeneration
GetTaskAssistCodeGeneration.documentation: API to get status of task assist code generation.

ListCodeAnalysisFindings.name: ListCodeAnalysisFindings
ListCodeAnalysisFindings.documentation: Lists the findings from a particular code analysis job.

ListFeatureEvaluations.name: ListFeatureEvaluations
ListFeatureEvaluations.documentation: Return configruations for each feature that has been setup for A/B testing.

StartTaskAssistCodeGeneration.name: StartTaskAssistCodeGeneration
StartTaskAssistCodeGeneration.documentation: API to start task assist code generation.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: This exception is thrown when the user does not have sufficient access to perform this action.

propertyContext.documentation: Context about how the property is used

AppStudioState.documentation: Description of a user's context when they are calling Q Chat from AppStudio

content.documentation: The content of the text message in markdown format.

CodeGenerationId.documentation: ID which represents a single code generation in a conversation

CodeGenerationStatusDetail.documentation: Detailed message about the code generation status

CodeScanEvent.documentation: Published when a security scan or code review starts

CodeScanFailedEvent.documentation: Published when a security scan or code review fails

CodeScanSucceededEvent.documentation: Published when a security scan or code review completes successfully

ConflictException.documentation: This exception is thrown when the action to perform could not be completed because the resource is in a conflicting state.

ConsoleState.documentation: Information about the state of the AWS management console page from which the user is calling

ContextTruncationScheme.documentation: Workspace context truncation schemes based on usecase

conversationId.documentation: Unique identifier for the chat conversation stream

currentMessage.documentation: Holds the current message being processed or displayed.

ConversationState.documentation: Structure to represent the current state of a chat conversation.

position.documentation: Represents a cursor position in a Text Document

range.documentation: Represents a text selection in a Text Document

CursorState.documentation: Represents the state of the Cursor in an Editor

useRelevantDocuments.documentation: Whether service should use relevant document in prompt

operatingSystem.documentation: The name of the operating system in use

currentWorkingDirectory.documentation: The current working directory of the environment

environmentVariables.documentation: The environment variables set in the current environment

timezoneOffset.documentation: Local timezone offset of the client. For more information, see documentation https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date/getTimezoneOffset

content.documentation: The content of the text message in markdown format.

GetTaskAssistCodeGenerationRequest.documentation: Request for getting task assist code generation.

GetTaskAssistCodeGenerationResponse.documentation: Response for getting task assist code generation status.

GetTestGenerationRequest.documentation: Structure to represent get test generation request.

GetTestGenerationResponse.documentation: Structure to represent get test generation response.

GetTransformationPlanRequest.documentation: Structure to represent get code transformation plan request.

GetTransformationPlanResponse.documentation: Structure to represent get code transformation plan response.

GetTransformationRequest.documentation: Structure to represent get code transformation request.

GetTransformationResponse.documentation: Structure to represent get code transformation response.

InternalServerException.documentation: This exception is thrown when an unexpected error occurred during the processing of a request.

character.documentation: Character offset on a line in a document (zero-based)

Position.documentation: Indicates Cursor postion in a Text Document

Range.documentation: Indicates Range / Span in a Text Document

relativeFilePath.documentation: Filepath relative to the root of the workspace

RelevantTextDocument.documentation: Represents an IDE retrieved relevant Text Document / File

ResourceNotFoundException.documentation: This exception is thrown when describing a resource that does not exist.

ResumeTransformationRequest.documentation: Structure to represent stop code transformation request.

ResumeTransformationResponse.documentation: Structure to represent stop code transformation response.

source.documentation: A human-readable string describing the source of the diagnostic

RuntimeDiagnostic.documentation: Structure to represent metadata about a Runtime Diagnostics

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: This exception is thrown when request was denied due to caller exceeding their usage limits

directory.documentation: The directory the command was ran in

exitCode.documentation: The exit code of the command after it finished

ShellHistoryEntry.documentation: An single entry in the shell history

shellHistory.documentation: The history previous shell commands for the current shell

StartTaskAssistCodeGenerationRequest.documentation: Structure to represent start code generation request.

StartTaskAssistCodeGenerationResponse.documentation: Structure to represent start code generation response.

StopTransformationRequest.documentation: Structure to represent stop code transformation request.

StopTransformationResponse.documentation: Structure to represent stop code transformation response.

SupplementaryWebLink.documentation: Represents an additional reference link retured with the Chat message

relativeTargetPath.documentation: The file path relative to the root of the workspace, could be a single file or a folder.

filePath.documentation: File path on which the step is working on.

startLine.documentation: Start line number of the related changes.

endLine.documentation: End line number of the related changes.

TaskAssistPlanStep.documentation: Structured plan step for a task assist plan.

relativeFilePath.documentation: Filepath relative to the root of the workspace

document.documentation: Represents a Text Document associated with Diagnostic

range.documentation: The range at which the message applies.

source.documentation: A human-readable string describing the source of the diagnostic

TextDocumentDiagnostic.documentation: Structure to represent metadata about a TextDocument Diagnostic

ThrottlingException.documentation: This exception is thrown when request was denied due to request throttling.

userInputMessageContext.documentation: Chat message context associated with the Chat Message

UserInputMessage.documentation: Structure to represent a chat input message from User

appStudioContext.documentation: The state of a user's AppStudio UI when sending a message.

consoleState.documentation: Contextual information about the environment from which the user is calling.

userSettings.documentation: Settings information, e.g., whether the user has enabled cross-region API calls.

UserInputMessageContext.documentation: Additional Chat message context associated with the Chat Message

UserSettings.documentation: Settings information passed by the Q widget

ValidationException.documentation: This exception is thrown when the input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by the service.

uploadId.documentation: Upload ID representing an Upload using a PreSigned URL

contextTruncationScheme.documentation: Workspace context truncation schemes based on usecase

WorkspaceState.documentation: Represents a Workspace state uploaded to S3 for Async Code Actions
